lead_paragraph: Deanna Nolan scored 20 of her franchise playoff-record 30 points in the first half to help the defending champion Detroit Shock advance to the W.N.B.A. finals with an 81-65 victory over the visiting Indiana Fever in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals. The Shock will face Phoenix starting tomorrow night as it goes for its third title in five years.
